and me :-)

Hierl Diem
level 36 Shaman, Cazic-Thule
Dragon Guardians of Eternity

At 09:59 AM 2/15/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Dan Leavy <dan@...>
>

>
>im here too =)
>
>Jorn
>Karana

>jeff.jackson@... wrote:
>>
>> From: jeff.jackson@...
>>
>> Heh. Welcome. Its just you and me.
>>
>> > -----Original Message-----
>> > From: EXT EQCheats@onelist.com [mailto:EQCheats@onelist.com]

>> > To: EQCheats@onelist.com
>> > Subject: [EQCheats] Digest Number 174
>> >
>> >
>> > Message: 1
>> > Date: 15 Feb 2000 09:23:34 -0000
>> > From: king_charlemagne@...
>> > Subject: Family of Friends
>> >
>> > Hail and Well Met
>> >
>> > I am a new member to this list nd just wanted to say hello to
>> > everyone. I hope to learn much from this list and gain
>> > friendships from others on it. Perhaps even grouping with
>> > some in the Future. I play on the a Paladin mainly myself but
>> > am the Guildmaster of the new guild Family of Friends
>> http://www.geocities.com/onlineguild/ and make it my business to know about
>> all the different aspects of the game to help my fellow guildmates. Family
>> of Friends is currently recruiting and we have a membership application
area
>> on our web site for potential recruits. Family of Friends resides on the
>> Bertoxxulous server. If nothing else there are two very useful links for
>> online gamers in general on our links page.
>>
>> ...And Justice For All
>> Charlemagne
